title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Llansannan, Colwyn.
title.cy: Parti cangen Merched y Wawr Llansannan, Rhanbarth Colwyn. Mawrth, 1973.

description.en: Llun o Parti Merched Cangen Llansannan ym mis Mawrth, 1973. Roedd y Parti yn mynd ymweld a changhennau eraill i gynnal nosweithiau cymdeithasu/ diddannu. Ann Gelli, Mrs E C Evans, Eirlys Jones, Eurwen Roberts, Megan Evans Eurwen Roberts, Bessie Davies, Iorwen Roberts, Mary Jones, Mrs Williams (blaen) Mrs Williams, Mrs J J Morries, Gwerfyl Jones, Gwen Wyn Jones, Mair Selway, Eirwen Bailey, Megan Roberts.
description.cy: Llun o Parti Merched Cangen Llansannan ym mis Martha, 1973. Roedd y Parti yn mynd ymweld a changhennau eraill i gynnal nosweithiau cymdeithasu/ diddannu. Ann Gelli, Mrs E C Evans, Eirlys Jones, Eurwen Roberts, Megan Evans Eurwen Roberts, Bessie Davies, Iorwen Roberts, Mary Jones, Mrs Williams (blaen) Mrs Williams, Mrs J J Morries, Gwerfyl Jones, Gwen Wyn Jones, Mair Selway, Eirwen Bailey, Megan Roberts.
